title: The Magnet
description: Personal Magnetism, Personal Power. Foreword by Stephen Richards, Author of "Cosmic Ordering Guide". I have taken classic teachings on the Law of Attraction, brought them back from obscurity, and added a modern interpretation in my revival of "The Magnet", based on the writings of Lida A. Churchill in 1903. When you work with the wisdom in this book you can begin to attract positively and become the perfect magnet for all that is good.
author: Brenda El-Leithy
